title: V's of Data
content:
Velocity, Variety, Volume, (Veracity, Value)

  • Volume- Data at Rest (Terabytes to exabytes of existing data to process) 
  • Variety- Data in many forms (structured, unstructured, text, multimedia)
  • Velocity- Data in Motion (streaming data)
  • Veracity- Data in Doubt (uncertainty due to data inconsistency & incompleteness.)
